cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 1 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Basic 8 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Air conditioned Female Only dorm with shared bathroom and kitchen access. Maximum 8 guest capacity. Secure pin-code access and locker. Linen supplied for booked guests. FREE WIFI. Access to washing machine & dryer. Located in the city heart of Townsville.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

specialEventConditions.title: Christmas day & boxing day.
specialEventConditions.description: Not taking bookings on  Christmas day and boxing day, 25th and 26th 2025 all bookings made for this dates will be immediately cancelled.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 16th Nov 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 16th Nov 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
